meanings: (칼을 쥐는 부분) handle (of a knife), hilt
hold a sword by the hilt
adjust one's grip on the sword

vlive.korean: 이제부터 칼자루가 저에게 주어졌네요. You guys handed me the sword. 듣기 View video SF9 : ♨(KING OF)부릉이 쟁탈전5♨ (부제 : 휘영이를 이겨라)
vlive.english: You guys handed me the sword.
